content: Currently PhD student at the Deutsches Primatenzentrum (Göttingen, Germany), I consider myself as a non-specialist. The ethology appears to me as a discipline in the interaction of many others, open to interdisciplinary exchanges, which reinforce my interest in behavioural studies. I am particularly interested in social interactions and communication thematics. I’m also deeply interested in combining comparative and ecosystematic approaches and field work.

title: Louise Peckre
